croppingStep.cropYourPhoto:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the image cropping step
**UI Location**: Avatar selector → Cropping modal (header)
**When Users See This**: After selecting an image for avatar and entering the cropping interface
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Crop your photo"
croppingStep.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to cancel the image cropping process
**UI Location**: Avatar selector → Cropping modal (footer button)
**When Users See This**: While cropping an image, user decides not to proceed with the crop
**Technical Context**: Standard button label
**Current English**: "Cancel"
croppingStep.crop:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to confirm and apply the image crop
**UI Location**: Avatar selector → Cropping modal (footer button)
**When Users See This**: User has adjusted the crop area and is ready to save it
**Technical Context**: Standard button label
**Current English**: "Crop"
